title: Display Toolbar on Firefox on iPad Pro 2.9
content: How do I show Firefox bookmark toolbar on my iPad Pro, that I setup on my iMac? Is there some other way to access all my bookmarks I’ve set up in Firefox on my iMac?
creator: slimsrider

title: Video quality within webpages
content: I use a wifi so have limited data available. I watch a lot of news streams which don't require a high quality picture. lots of times I just listen. In order to save data I go into the settings every time I refresh or change webpages and change the video quality to the minimum available. In order to skip this every time is there an add on or some way I can set up firefox so the default for every page is the minimum quality?
creator: ark4162

title: Seperate shortcuts on the same profile
content: I want to use the same profile for different computers as I require syncing but would like to have different shortcuts as the computers have different default use. I could not find anyway to customise this for more than my main computer. Is this even possible?
creator: bryanwongchinkit

title: firefox se pone blanco y se cierra al abrir dos pestañas
content: me pasa ese error de que no puedo tener mas de una pestaña abierta en firefox porque se me cuelga firefox, aveces se pone blanca la pantalla y se restablece, otras veces pasa lo mimo pero me sale el error de pestaña fallida, y en otras se me cierra de golpe solo se que tengo 525 mb de ram, en la imagen el crash reason es el que siempre me sale en ese error que me pasa constantemente
creator: kirbylink96

title: I like to send my bookmarks to friend e-mail this should be as attachment?
content: I am trying to send my bookmarks to a friend and how to do this?
creator: johnmilada

title: Fire fox are bookmarks
content: Downloaded new Firefox update. Where are my bookmarks. Every other time, no problem. Now 10 years of bookmarks are gone.
creator: TimHowden

title: Firefox synced some closed tabs
content: Months ago, I had some tabs open on my PC. After I haven't opened my browser for months, these tabs was no longer show up on the Firefox on PC. But when I connected my Firefox account on another device and synced my history, those tabs appeared in the "Open Tabs" again. Those make my "Open Tabs" verbose and difficult to get the information I need. But since I can't see these tabs on my PC, I can't close them. To remove those tabs, I tried reconnecting my account and clearing the local datas on my Firefox on my PC, but it didn't work.
creator: lurito

title: Firefox will not save logins or passwords
creator: danfar

title: Active tab border
content:
Hello, From FF 99 I have removed the floating tabs with CSS code but after updating to 104 instead of the active tab being differentiated with a shadow it now has a black border. Is there any way to change that back while still keeping the CSS code I have for the floating tabs?

The code I have is: .tab-background{ border-radius: 0px 0px !important; margin-bottom: 0px !important; } .tabbrowser-tab:not([selected=true]):not([multiselected=true]) .tab-background{ background-color: color-mix(in srgb, currentColor 5%, transparent); } .tab-background{ border-color: transparent !important }

Thanks.
creator: meeshymee

title: Can i disable ctrl + m shortcut?
content:
Hi,

Often the ctrl + m (mute tab) shortcut gets in my way while using the browser as i use this shortcut in something else. I would like to know if it is possible to disable that.

Thanks. (Message written using Google Translate)
creator: josevneves
